biotools.summary: BaMORC (Bayesian Model Optimized Reference Correction) is designed to facilitate protein NMR research with an easy-to-use tool that detects and corrects 13C referencing errors before and after the protein resonance assignment step.

bioschemas.name: BaMORC
bioschemas.summary: BaMORC (Bayesian Model Optimized Reference Correction) is designed to facilitate protein NMR research with an easy-to-use tool that detects and corrects 13C referencing errors before and after the protein resonance assignment step.
